title: How long does it take to write 50,000 words? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now, in my old age, it would take me a couple of years. At my fastest, in my twenties, I might have managed in two months. Whether the words were any good would be another matter. (For awhile, when I was just starting out, I wouldn’t quit for the day until I’d finished a thousand words, then five hundred. Now I’d go with old Ernie, and be satisfied with “one true sentence.”) For most of my writing career, it took me a couple of years to write a novel. That would be anywhere from 60,000 to 150,000 words. Some good writing takes a long time. Some bad writing never ends.
